Citation/Acknowledgement
========================

Citation
--------
If you use this package in your research, please cite:

.. code-block:: py
     :name: bibitem

     @article{Guo:2024wxy,
     author = "Guo, Yuxun and Ji, Xiangdong and Santiago, M. Gabriel and Yang, Jinghong and Zhang, Hao-Cheng",
     title = "{Small-$x$ gluon GPD constrained from deeply virtual $J/\psi$ production and gluon PDF through universal-moment parameterization}",
     eprint = "2409.17231",
     archivePrefix = "arXiv",
     primaryClass = "hep-ph",
     month = "9",
     year = "2024"
     }

     @article{Guo:2023ahv,
     author = "Guo, Yuxun and Ji, Xiangdong and Santiago, M. Gabriel and Shiells, Kyle and Yang, Jinghong",
     title = "{Generalized parton distributions through universal moment parameterization: non-zero skewness case}",
     eprint = "2302.07279",
     archivePrefix = "arXiv",
     primaryClass = "hep-ph",
     doi = "10.1007/JHEP05(2023)150",
     journal = "JHEP",
     volume = "05",
     pages = "150",
     year = "2023"
     }

Acknowledgement
---------------
This package benefits from the open-source `Gepard <https://gepard.phy.hr/>`_ package!

Researches related to this package is supported by the U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Science, Office of Nuclear Physics, under contract number DE-SC0020682,
and the Center for Nuclear Femtography, Southeastern Universities Research Association, Washington D.C.
The authors also acknowledge partial support by the U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Science, Office of Nuclear Physics under the umbrella of the Quark-Gluon Tomography (QGT) Topical Collaboration with Award DE-SC0023646.
